00024 #ifndef _SPECTRUMLISTFILTER_HPP_
00025 #define _SPECTRUMLISTFILTER_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "MSData.hpp"
00029 #include "utility/misc/IntegerSet.hpp"
00030 #include "boost/logic/tribool.hpp"
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace pwiz {
00034 namespace msdata {
00035 
00036 
00037 /// SpectrumList filter, for creating Spectrum sub-lists
00038 class SpectrumListFilter : public SpectrumList
00039 {
00040     public:
00041 
00042     /// client-implemented filter predicate -- called during construction of
00043     /// SpectrumListFilter to create the filtered list of spectra
00044     struct Predicate
00045     {
00046         /// return values:
00047         ///  true: accept the Spectrum
00048         ///  false: reject the Spectrum
00049         ///  indeterminate: need to see the full Spectrum object to decide
00050         virtual boost::logic::tribool accept(const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const 
00051         {return false;} 
00052 
00053         /// return true iff Spectrum is accepted
00054         virtual bool accept(const Spectrum& spectrum) const {return false;} 
00055 
00056         /// return true iff done accepting spectra; 
00057         /// this allows early termination of the iteration through the original
00058         /// SpectrumList, possibly using assumptions about the order of the
00059         /// iteration (e.g. index is increasing, nativeID interpreted as scan number is
00060         /// increasing, ...)
00061         virtual bool done() const {return false;} 
00062 
00063         virtual ~Predicate() {}
00064     };
00065 
00066     SpectrumListFilter(const SpectrumListPtr original, const Predicate& predicate);
00067 
00068     /// \name SpectrumList interface
00069     //@{
00070     virtual size_t size() const;
00071     virtual const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity(size_t index) const;
00072     virtual SpectrumPtr spectrum(size_t index, bool getBinaryData = false) const;
00073     //@}
00074 
00075     private:
00076     struct Impl;
00077     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00078     SpectrumListFilter(SpectrumListFilter&);
00079     SpectrumListFilter& operator=(SpectrumListFilter&);
00080 };
00081 
00082 
00083 class SpectrumListFilterPredicate_IndexSet : public SpectrumListFilter::Predicate
00084 {
00085     public:
00086     SpectrumListFilterPredicate_IndexSet(const pwiz::util::IntegerSet& indexSet);
00087     virtual boost::logic::tribool accept(const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;
00088     virtual bool done() const;
00089 
00090     private:
00091     pwiz::util::IntegerSet indexSet_;
00092     mutable bool eos_;
00093 };
00094 
00095 
00096 class SpectrumListFilterPredicate_ScanNumberSet : public SpectrumListFilter::Predicate
00097 {
00098     public:
00099     SpectrumListFilterPredicate_ScanNumberSet(const pwiz::util::IntegerSet& scanNumberSet);
00100     virtual boost::logic::tribool accept(const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;
00101     virtual bool done() const;
00102 
00103     private:
00104     pwiz::util::IntegerSet scanNumberSet_;
00105     mutable bool eos_;
00106 };
